name: Checkers - Online Board Game
description:
The popular classic board game Checkers also known as Draughts is finally available with online multiplayer.

A simple strategy game where your try to form mills to remove the opponents pieces to win the game.

Online multiplayer
Play online against players around the world. No login necessary.

Offline multiplayer
Play offline against your friend on one device.

Computer opponents
Test your skills against three different computer opponents.

High Scores
Compare your ELO and your game statistics with other players.

Checkers is a fast strategy game that is easy to learn and offers both beginners and experienced players strategic challenges.

If you're an advanced player already, try to win against the best players online.
